ICONOLAB Renewal Face Oil (2019 formulation)

Brand: ICONOLAB

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) OIL, BORAGO OFFICINALIS (BORAGE) OIL, CORYLUS AVELLANA (HAZELNUT) OIL, OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER OIL, OLIVE SQUALANE OIL, RIBES NIGRUM (BLACK CURRANT) SEED OIL

CK CURRANT) SEED OIL, PERSEA AMERICANA (AVOCADO) SEED OIL, LINUM USITATISSIMUM (FLAX) SEED OIL, ROSA CANINA (ROSEHIP) SEED OIL, TOCOPHEROL (VITAMIN E) OIL, ROSA DAMASCENA (ROSE OTTO) ESSENTIAL OIL, CANANGA ODORATA (YLANG YLANG) ESSENTIAL OIL.

Directions: Apply two to three drops morning and/or evening to clean face and neck. Please do not touch dr

ease do not touch dropper directly to skin to prevent contamination.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
